DESCRIPTION.P: Colon symbol : can be used to form implicit vectors. (see also linspace, logspace)

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: j:k
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: is the vector [j, j+1,...,k] (empty if j>k).

DESCRIPTION.P: The colon notation can also be used to pick out selected rows, columns and elements of vectors and matrices (see also extraction,insertion)

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: A(:)
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: is the vector of all the elements of A regarded as a single column.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: A(:,j)
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: ys the j-th column of A

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: A(:)=w
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: fills the matrix A with entries of w (taken column by column if w is a matrix).
